MoMA P.S.1 Young Architects Program 10th Anniversary Review

A 10-year retrospective exhibition of the Young Architects Program (YAP) installed at MoMA P.S.1 to celebrate the anniversary of the competition. 40 collected interviews and the thousands of digital images became the basis for MoMAâ€™s YAP digital archive and website.
